fee_structure.demonstrate_knowledge_of_the_psychosocia: Demonstrate cognitive, metacognitive, emotional and behavioral skills to function effectively in a multicultural work environment.
Conduct scientific research, psychometric assessment, and organizational diagnostics that will enable them to deal with real work-life scenarios.
Demonstrate leadership skills through strategic thinking, negotiation, and ethical behavior to provide training and consulting services.
Create and advocate diversity and inclusion policies and practices in organizations to enhance the work environment.
Resolve organizational issues by adopting evidence- based interventions while adhering to the legal requirements and the core values of the organization.
Create mental health and wellness practices and employee assistance programmes in alignment with contemporary mental health perspectives.

eligibility:
PO1:
Demonstrate knowledge of the psychosocial factors that influence the cognition, emotion, and behavior of individuals in organizations, and the application of the principles of Human Resource Development and Management.
PO2:

why_choose: Why choose this course? To obtain a comprehensive understanding of human behavior Research Dissertation under the guidance of experts from national faculties. Two months of classes in Berlin and interaction with international faculties. Mix of theory and practice in an updated curriculum Interaction with working professionals Industry internship with mandatory projects
what_learn: What you will learn? Manage and resolve organizational problems using evidence based approach. Apply cutting-edge research and best practices for organizational needs. Self-study of the modules in the digital platforms and in classroom settings. To build the sense of responsibility and start accepting responsibility. Create mental health and wellness practices and employee assistance programmes in alignment with contemporary mental health perspectives. Conducting scientific research, psychometric assessment, and organizational diagnostics that will enable us to deal with real work-life scenarios. Demonstrate the knowledge to increase business efficiency and employee productivity adhering to the legal requirements and the core values of the organization.
